body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting AutoCare Customer Support. My name is Joe Turner. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Debra Brooks.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Debra. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having a billing issue with my recent service appointment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Debra. To better assist you, may I have your contact number and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my contact number is five five five one two three four and my email is debra.brooks@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Debra. I will look into your billing issue and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Debra. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
